Café Atelier September  Review | Bon Appetit








































Close Menu IconLoginRecipesCookingCultureShoppingRestaurantsBA MarketVideosPodcastSubscribe to our newsletterSign UpPrivacy and user agreementMain Navigation IconBA LogoBon appetitLogincopenhagenCafé Atelier SeptemberThe breezy Indre By café that’s turned avocado toast into an art formFacebookPinterestTwitterEmailPhoto by Ditte IsagerGO HERE: to feel like you’re living your best breakfast life. This Gothersgade Street café started out as a furniture and antiques store, and it shows (that’s their gorgeous butik next door). Turns out the owners have an eye for great chefs too.ORDER THE: perfectly shingled avocado on whole grain toast; matcha granola with zucchini jam; seasonal smørrebrød; and matcha latte. Chef Frederik Bille Brahe’s menu keeps it healthy, with a camera-ready twist.THE VIBE IS: beautiful people in a beautiful room eating beautiful avocado toast. We’re just going to warn you: Everyone here is better-looking and better–dressed than 97 percent of Americans. And their apartments are prettier too. Still. Don’t feel shy.PRACTICAL STUFF: Open every day: Monday to Friday, from 7:30 a.m. to 5 p.m.; Saturday, from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m.; and Sunday, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Also visit the sister spots: Apollo Bar and the new Kafeteria SMK in the National Gallery of Denmark.—Christine MuhlkePhoto by Ditte IsagerPhoto by Ditte IsagerWE ALSO LOVEDemocratic CoffeeOne more reason to love the library (or at least this Indre By one): buttery croissantsApollo Bar & KantineLook at contemporary art, eat some stellar bread at this Indre By hot spotGasoline GrillDon’t be fooled by the gas pumps—this mini chain serves Copenhagen's greatest burgerExplore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
